0.objective: Hostile rogue exiles roam Wraeclast in the Anarchy league. Slay all 13 to complete this challenge. Everyone in the area will receive credit for the kill.

1.objective: Own 90 specific Unique items to complete this challenge. Note that if you trade any away, the challenge will un-complete until you obtain the item again. Uniques in both Anarchy and Onslaught leagues are counted for this challenge.

2.objective: Use the following 23 currency items in either Anarchy or Onslaught.

3.objective: Attain character level 60 with each class in the Onslaught league. This challenge still counts even if a character dies after reaching level 60.

4.objective: Complete vendor recipes in either Anarchy or Onslaught to receive each of the following items. A vendor recipe is when you trade a specific pattern of items to a vendor, not when you buy items from his/her purchase screen.

5.objective: This challenge tracks which Maps are used by you in the Map Device in either Anarchy or Onslaught. It does not count Maps that you join, just ones you create.

6.objective: Kill all the monsters in every area of the game in Anarchy or Onslaught. You can complete this in any difficulty level. Use the /remaining command to see how many monsters remain, once you're getting close. Everyone in the area will receive credit for the clear.

7.objective: Allocate this list of Passive Skills in either Anarchy or Onslaught. They will still count even if refunded by Orbs of Regret or quest rewards and can be spread across multiple characters. Skills that have been allocated are marked on the Passive Skill Tree with a small green tick.

8.objective: Kill a Rare Monster of each of these types in Domination or Nemesis.

9.objective: Touch each of these shrines in the Domination league to gain their powers.

10.objective: Kill Rare monsters with each of these Nemesis Mods.

11.objective: Attain character level 65 with each class in the Domination or Nemesis leagues. This challenge still counts even if a character dies after reaching level 65.

12.objective: Own 65 specific Unique items to complete this challenge. Note that if you trade any away, the challenge will un-complete until you obtain the item again. Uniques in both Domination and Nemesis leagues are counted for this challenge.

14.objective: Use the following 23 currency items in either Domination or Nemesis.

15.objective: Complete vendor recipes in either Domination or Nemesis to receive each of the following items. A vendor recipe is when you trade a specific pattern of items to a vendor, not when you buy items from his/her purchase screen.

367.objective: Kill each of the following Unique Bosses in Normal Difficulty.

368.objective: Kill packs of Magic monsters with each of the following Bloodline Mods.

369.objective: Use a Master's Crafting Bench to add a mod to each of the following types of item.

370.objective: Kill 50 monsters that are carrying Silver Coins.

371.objective: Touch each of these Shrines to gain their powers.

372.objective: Reach Reputation Level 5 with at least 5 of these 8 Forsaken Masters.

373.objective: Kill each of the following Unique Bosses in Cruel Difficulty.

374.objective: Kill each of these Tormented Spirits or Rare/Unique monsters possessed by them.

375.objective: Kill each of the following Rogue Exiles.

376.objective: Kill each of the following Unique monsters in any Difficulty.

377.objective: Open each of the following Strongboxes.

378.objective: Kill a monster that has each of the following Essences.

379.objective: Kill each of the following Unique bosses.

380.objective: Kill Rare monsters with each of these Nemesis Mods.

382.objective: Complete each of the following Encounters.

383.objective: Create or Upgrade to a Large-sized Hideout.

384.objective: Kill each of the following Unique bosses in Merciless Difficulty.

385.objective: Attain character level 90. This challenge still counts even if your character dies afterwards.

386.objective: Level up a Skill Gem or a Support Gem to level 20. You can trade it away afterwards.

387.objective: Kill each of the following Unique bosses.

388.objective: Complete any 4 of the following 8 Prophecy Chains.

389.objective: Use the Ascendancy Device in each of the following places.

391.objective: Complete each of the following Encounters.

392.objective: Kill Map Bosses of the following map tiers while they are affected by Onslaught.

393.objective: Complete Rare Maps in 10 of the following 16 tiers while they are unidentified. These Maps are completed by killing their Unique Bosses.

394.objective: Kill each of the following Warband Leaders.

395.objective: Complete Maps in the following 15 tiers while they have the Twinned mod. These Maps are completed by killing their Unique Bosses.

396.objective: Complete Maps in the following 15 tiers while they have 8 mods. Maps having 8 mods is a potential outcome of Vaal Orb corruption. These Maps are completed by killing their Unique Bosses. Sextant mods do not count towards the mod count of this challenge.

397.objective: Complete any 12 of the following 16 Unique Maps on your Atlas. A Map is completed by killing its Unique Boss or Bosses if it has any. Maps without Unique Bosses are completed by opening specific Unique Chests.

398.objective: Complete 1000 Maps of Tier 6 or higher with 3 Leaguestones active.

400.objective: Find The Shaper and kill him.

401.objective: Complete any 4 of these encounters the specified number of times.

402.objective: Complete the Eternal Labyrinth in a non-Hardcore league.

403.objective: Complete the Eternal Labyrinth in a Hardcore League.

406.objective: Kill Izaro and have him drop 3 treasure keys.

407.objective: Kill a god and obtain their power.

408.objective: Equip two unique items with the same name.

409.objective: Complete a map area that is affected by 10 or more mods. This can include mods from Sextants and other mods that are not on the map item.

410.objective: Open a map in the map device and step through its portal.

411.objective: Kill Abaxoth, The End of All That Is.

412.objective: Complete a Forsaken Master's daily mission.

413.objective: Level 7 Forsaken Masters to their maximum level.

416.objective: Corrupt an Essence monster with a Remnant of Corruption.

417.objective: Kill a monster that is under the influence of five Essence mods.

419.objective: Use an orb to change the mods of a Strongbox.

420.objective: Find all of the Shaper's Memory Fragments.

424.objective: Kill both Lunaris and Solaris in the same encounter.

427.objective: Complete all of the white maps on the Atlas.

428.objective: Complete all of the yellow maps on the Atlas.

429.objective: Complete all of the red maps on the Atlas.

430.objective: Complete every map on the Atlas.

432.objective: Kill Atziri in the Alluring Abyss.

433.objective: Upgrade a map with a Shaper's Orb.

441.objective: Fully clear a Corrupted Vaal side area.

442.objective: Open each of the following Strongboxes.
